data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 11,710 believers in Karur, Tamil Nadu, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karur, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Karur, Tamil Nadu, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 86 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Karur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Karur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Karur.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Palliyan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Karur, Tamil Nadu, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Karur that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Karur, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,064,500.

We estimate Karur has 11,710 people who might know Jesus, 12,916 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,039,875 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Karur, Tamil Nadu, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
